heroCards.title: Super Architecture
heroCards.descr: Modular, realiable, OOP, simple fast, for scalable client-side code.

heroCards.title: No Dependencies
heroCards.descr: Independent of any third-party libraries or frameworks.

heroCards.title: Well Documented
heroCards.descr: Each component and module has descriptions and API.

heroCards.title: Real Life Tested
heroCards.descr: We use it in our work. On this site too for the front and admin.

featuresCards.title: Simple usage
featuresCards.descr: Our library makes things simple like never before, by preferring code over configuration.

featuresCards.title: Efficient builds
featuresCards.descr: Using the power of node streams, first gives you fast builds that don't write intermediary.

featuresCards.title: Flexible library
featuresCards.descr: Our library is designed to be agnostic about your setup and style of coding.

featuresCards.title: Friendly Syntax
featuresCards.descr: Our library starts from the same syntax that millions of JavaScript developers know today

featuresCards.title: Suit for large apps
featuresCards.descr: Using the power of node streams, first gives you fast builds that don't write intermediary.

featuresCards.title: State of the art JavaScript
featuresCards.descr: Our library offers support for the latest and evolving JavaScript features.
